columns.id: The unique identifier for each song.
columns.language: The language in which the song is performed.
columns.original_artist: The name of the original artist of the song.
columns.name: The title of the song.
columns.english_translation: The English translation of the song title.

songs.table_description: The table stores details of songs in the contest.

columns.participant_id: The unique identifier for each participant in the contest.
columns.songs_id: The unique identifier for each song performed.
columns.voice_sound_quality: The quality of the participant's vocal performance.
columns.rhythm_tempo: The tempo of the song's rhythm as perceived in performance.
columns.stage_presence: The ability of the participant to engage with the audience.

performance_score.table_description: The table records performance scores for participants in the contest.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each participant.
columns.name: The name of the participant in the contest.
columns.popularity: The popularity score of the participant based on votes.

participants.table_description: The table holds information about participants in the singing contest.
